title: Process an Employee Resignation
description: An employee submits their two-week notice of resignation.

tasks.description: Receive the resignation letter and acknowledge it in writing.
tasks.expected_outcome: HR specialist receives the resignation and sends a confirmation email.

tasks.description: Enter the termination date into the HRIS to trigger the offboarding workflow.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist correctly enters the employee's last day in the system.

tasks.description: Prepare the final paycheck and benefits paperwork for the employee's last day.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist calculates and prepares all final separation documents and pay.
